1.title: Fear Factor

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Quincy attends a course to try to overcome his fears, but when The Instructor goes off to get something, with Gavin in the Fear workshop and some other Fraidy pets looking up to Quincy, he must be brave.

2.title: Good Luck Jade

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: When Edie tends to have a seemingly-endless chain of bad luck, Jade appears to have nothing but good luck, and Roxie tries to get Jade to give some of her good luck to Edie.

3.title: Double-Booked Bev

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Bev ends up overbooking her schedule with favors for her friends in Pawtucket, and hilarity ensues.

4.title: As the Hamster Wheel Turns

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Jade concerns over Edie watching too many soap operas, so when Edie starts believing her friends are living the life of a soap opera, Jade sets up a scheme with the other pets so they could play along with her.

5.title: Homesick as a Dog

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Roxie is unable to return to her home because she lost her key that she needed to return. Her friends try to cheer her up while they try to find her key.

6.title: Never Go to Bed

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Jade tries to stay awake for a whole day to prove to her friends that cats do more than just sleep all day, but the lack of sleep causes her to lose her mind.

7.title: Nightmare at 30,000 Bleats

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Quincy wins a chance to ride on an airship with the pop star, Savannah, but it turns out to be an adventure when something goes wrong with the ship, and now, they must try to fix it.

8.title: Pet Side Story

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Edie casts her friends in a play called Pet Side Story, and she discovers a shy bat who has remarkable talent and insists she play the lead in the play.

9.title: Seeing Double

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: A southern parakeet named Didi, who looks identical to Edie, comes to Pawtucket. Jealous of the life Edie lives, Didi is determined to replace her.

10.title: Trip Kwan Do

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Trip's idol, Master Croaker, invites him to replace one of his martial arts frogs for their performance in Pawtucket after Trip accidentally injures him. Trip frantically tries to learn Martial Arts since he doesn't know any of it.

11.title: With Friends Like These

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Edie and Gavin befriend each other when they discover they are both fans of Salty Dogs, but they both want to keep their fandom a total secret from their respective groups of friends.

12.title: Take This Suggestion And...

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Mr. Yut has Austin take suggestions from other pets to improve Littlest Pet Shop, which gives Mr. Yut compliments at first, but it soon backfires.

13.title: Surf and Turf Shindig

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Bev has a new set of aquatic friends and notices how identical they are to her real friends. She arranged to have them meet, but it turns out to be a train wreck.

14.title: Austin La Vista

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: The pets want Austin to play with them, but it turns out he's so good to the point where they feel uncomfortable around him.

15.title: Big Sis, Lil Pup

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Roxie gets assigned a young pal named Mabel, and Roxie must stick to the approved activities of The Pet Pals.

16.title: Trip for the Record

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Trip feels let down that he's the only pet in Pawtucket who hasn't broken any records, so he tries many attempts to get into their record book.

17.title: The Couch is Always Greener

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Unable to agree with each other's differences, Roxie and Jade decide to move out of their apartment and each find a new roommate.

18.title: Model Behavior

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: Roxie and Bev film a documentary about a pet fashion show, but it doesn't go as well as they had hoped.

19.title: Surprise! Paw-Zombies!

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: Quincy warns Jade about "Paw-Zombies" based off her favorite horror movie, but Roxie came up with that plan to make her show up at her birthday.

20.title: The Big Paw'd-Cast

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Roxie is obsessed with a Paw'd Cast Called "Wool Over His Eyes", But the Final Episode takes so long to wait, so she tries to find the producers to ask them how it ends.

21.title: Curiosity and Cats

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: Simon Puggerson hosts a Costume Party, But Jade's curiosity gets out of control and acts nosy over everyone.

22.title: Fetch the Story Stick

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: When a Limo Breakdown stops Edie from taking her friends to a musical she loves, Bev has an idea about a Story Stick That Everyone gets a turn to add plotlines to a fantasy story.

23.title: Eyes and Ears of Paw-Tucket

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: News Reporter Miranda Bunnet invites Roxie to do a special segment for The Pawtucket News Show.

24.title: Get Her to the Lips

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

24.plot: Bev and Roxie plan to Surprise Mister Yut for his birthday with A Savannah Cheetaby Concert, but they get the date wrong, and now Bev must go to The Chill Out Inn to find Savannah.

1.title: A Pet's Best Friend Is...

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Roxie hosts a party at Savannah's house when she is asked to house-sit for her.

2.title: Pet, Peeved

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Roxie tries to make Jade happy but keeps failing at doing so.

3.title: The Wheel Deal

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: The pets all attend a carnival at Pawtucket. Jade gets stuck on a Ferris wheel with another pet that she's very uninterested in.

4.title: In the Steal of the Night

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Items belonging to the pets of Pawtucket go mysteriously missing. Roxie forms an investigation team to try to find out who is stealing everyone's stuff.

5.title: Pitch Im-Purrfect

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Quincy wants to join Edie's a capella group for a talent show, but it turns out he's a terrible singer.

6.title: The Big Sleep-Over

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Roxie hosts a slumber party for her friends and tries everything she can to make it the best slumber party ever, but everything that can possibly go wrong does.

7.title: Let It Go (Not the Hit Song)

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Roxie accidentally gives away Jade's favorite toy to charity and searches all over Pawtucket for it.

8.title: The Fast and Fur-ious

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Roxie and her friends form a relay race team.

9.title: Slow Your Beau

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Edie's idol is coming to Pawtucket to tape her show live. It turns out Bev's cousin works as a producer for the show. Edie submits a recipe to her idol only for Bev's cousin to steal it and take credit for it.

10.title: A Brave New Quincy

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Trip tries to convince Quincy to do extreme sports with him, but Quincy is hesitant to do so. Quincy gets amnesia and now thinks he's a brave adventurer. At first, Trip likes this new Quincy but soon realizes he's going too far.

11.title: All Decked Out

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: The pets are invited to a dinner on a cruise ship, but Bev insists they all act formal.

12.title: Bev on the Edge

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Bev's friends think she's going to jump off the highest peak in Pawtucket and try to stop her for safety's sake.

13.title: The Call of the Mild

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Roxie takes her friends out on a camping trip to try to reconnect with their natural instincts.

14.title: Four Left Feet

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Roxie accidently tells Edie and Bev Jade's secret, that she does not land on her feet. Roxie finds herself running all over Paw-Tucket to put a lid on the information before it spreads out of control.

15.title: Copycats, Copy-Dogs & Copy-Iguanas

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: When Jade makes a scarf from a torn pillow, she's seen as a fashion-maven and copied by all the pets in Paw-Tucket. Her friends must find a way to change their minds, so they'll never copy her again.

16.title: The Imitation Game

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Quincy discovers his gift for mimicry and becomes a local celebrity. His best impression is of Eddie which makes her feel humiliated. He must choose between his newfound stardom and Eddie's feelings.

17.title: The Purr-fect Storm

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: When the crew of the Cruise Ship are hypnotized, the gang must take over. But Bev's strict rules drive her friends to the brink of mutiny. When crisis hits, will they be able to keep the ship afloat?

18.title: Spooky Tails

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: The pets go camping and have a contest to see who can tell the scariest campfire story. Trip's tale terrifies the others but it is Trip who becomes terrified when his story seems to be coming true.

19.title: Crystal Fever

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: When a big crystal convention comes to Paw-Tucket, Jade must keep her passion for crystals a secret while she looks for a rare crystal. Roxie tries to find out what Jade's secret enthusiasm might be.

20.title: So Trip Thinks He Can Dance?

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: When Petula posts a video of Trip's inept dancing online, the video goes viral. Unaware he's being made fun of, Trip thinks he will be a star. He discovers the truth but is comforted by a young fan.

21.title: Fine, Feathered Fortune Teller

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: Edie suspects she may have actual psychic powers and after a few correct predictions, others start to believe too. When Trip must make a big decision, Edie must decide if her powers are real or fake.

22.title: Scrappers Keepers

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: Roxie, Jade and Edie volunteer to babysit the juvenile Scrappers so they won't ruin the upcoming parade. Unable to tire them out, the Scappers run amok until Edie discovers her singing soothes them.

23.title: Bev Rolls With It

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: After Bev joins a roller derby team, her can-do attitude and skills give the team hope of actually winning a game, but her dedication proves to be physically exhausting and could lead to a bad injury.

24.title: CEO Trip

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

24.plot: When an investor buys into Trip's new invention, Trip finds himself crushed by the pressure of running a big company, a dilemma which his friends help him get out of by finding the next big invention.

25.title: The Incredible Roman and Ray

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

25.plot: Bev gets selected as a volunteer for an act performed by a magic duo. She soon discovers that their creative differences are putting them on the verge of breaking up, so she tries her best to keep them together and improve on their show.

26.title: Paw It Forward

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

26.plot: Roxie invites a sheepdog who injured his paw to stay at her apartment much to Jade's dismay. Jade discovers the sheepdog has faked his injury and tries to prove to Roxie that he's faking it.

27.title: Mayor May Not

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

27.plot: The mayor of Pawtucket decides to take some time off from being mayor, but then things go way out of hand in Pawtucket, so now the main pets try to convince the mayor to return.

28.title: The Scratch Tree Society

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

28.plot: Bev gets so fascinated by an organization known as the Scratch Tree Society and wants to join it despite it being strictly for cats.

1.title: Welcome to Paw-Tucket Park' - Digital Short

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Bev gives a "Welcome to Paw-Tucket" tour of Paw-Tucket Park, where she invites herself to all sorts of parties and almost misses out on one of her own.

-1.title: Welcome to the Amusement Park: Digital Short

episode of.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (TV Series 2017– )

-1.plot: Bev faces her fears and rides the 'terrifying' Bunny Hop rollercoaster.

imdb.title: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own
akas: Littlest Pet Shop: A World of Our Own (United States)
plot: Pets are visited to a new world used only by them.::Ja'Keylon Teal
